name: imprinted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
imprint
to mark a surface by pressing something hard into it
to fix an event or experience so firmly in the memory that it cannot be forgotten although you do not try to remember it: That look of grief would be imprinted on her mind forever.
